text: Hi all, is there a way to protect the editing of the page path in a HubDB for dynamic pages? The reason i am asking: i may need to let unexperienced  HubSpot Users edit a HubDB with 400 products displayed on dynamic pages. Once they do edit it, i do fear that they are changing page paths even if they are linked somewhere, creating broken links in the process.
I think in permissions you can set it to where they can edit but not publish.
So someone with publish permissions can go in and do “quality control” lol
